SEARCH
Package menu

Class OfficerMenu

java.lang.Object
menu.OfficerMenu
public class OfficerMenu extends Object
This class represents the menu interface for HDB Officers. It provides functionality for officers to manage projects, process applications, handle enquiries, and perform other officer-specific tasks.

  • Constructor Details

    • OfficerMenu

      public OfficerMenu(HDBOfficer officer, OfficerProjectFeatures projectFacade, OfficerApplicationFeatures appFacade, OfficerEnquiryFeatures enquiryFacade, OfficerRegistrationApplicantFeatures regFacade)
      Constructs a new Officer Menu with the specified HDB Officer and feature interfaces.
      Parameters:
      officer - The HDB Officer using this menu
      projectFacade - Interface for project-related operations
      appFacade - Interface for application-related operations
      enquiryFacade - Interface for enquiry-related operations
      regFacade - Interface for officer registration-related operations

  • Method Details

    • display

      public boolean display()
      Displays the Officer Menu.
      Returns:
      true if the user chooses to switch to the Applicant Menu, false if the user chooses to logout.

      private String generateUnitNumber(String unitType, String projectName)
      Generates a unique unit number for a new assignment
      Parameters:
      unitType - The type of unit (2-Room or 3-Room)
      projectName - The project name
      Returns:
      A generated unit number

    • hasDateOverlap

      private boolean hasDateOverlap(Project project, List<OfficerRegistration> registrations)
      Checks if a project's application period overlaps with any of the officer's existing registrations
      Parameters:
      project - The project to check for overlap
      registrations - The officer's existing registrations
      Returns:
      true if there is a date overlap, false otherwise

      Returns:
